# isLocked

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the document is locked.

## Declaration

```swift
var isLocked: Bool { get }
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the document is locked; [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Discussion

Only encrypted documents can be locked. Encrypted documents whose password is the empty string are unlocked automatically upon opening, because PDF Kit tries the empty string as a password if none is supplied. Use the [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFDocument/unlock(withPassword:)] method to unlock a document using a password.

## Managing Document Security

- **isEncrypted**: A Boolean value specifying whether the document is encrypted.
- **unlock(withPassword:)**: Attempts to unlock an encrypted document.
- **permissionsStatus**: The permissions status of the PDF document.
- **Permission Properties**: Properties that specify what functions are allowed for a PDF document.
